trans-unit.source: Defines the methods that workflow designer hosts can call to perform advanced UI operations.
trans-unit.target: 定義工作流程設計工具主應用程式可以呼叫來執行進階 UI 作業的方法。

trans-unit.source: The methods and properties provided by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IExtendedUIService> allow designer hosts to navigate to properties in the property browser window and allow the hosts to add task items to the task list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IExtendedUIService> 提供的方法和屬性可讓設計工具主應用程式巡覽至屬性瀏覽器視窗中的屬性，而且可讓主應用程式將工作項目新增至工作清單中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> that identifies the assembly to add.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />，識別要加入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the workflow designer host to add an assembly reference for the current project to access.
trans-unit.target: 指示工作流程設計工具主應用程式加入組件參考，以供目前的專案存取。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> array that contains the actions to add.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> 陣列，包含要加入的動作。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of designer actions to the list of available user actions in the workflow designer host.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具動作陣列加入至工作流程設計工具主應用程式中可用的使用者動作清單。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the universal resource locator (URL) of the Web resource to provide the project access to.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，表示要提供專案存取之 Web 資源的「統一資源定位器」(URL)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the proxy class associated with the Web resource.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含與 Web 資源關聯之 Proxy 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Adds a reference to a Web resource to a project in a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 將 Web 資源的參考新增至工作流程設計工具中的專案。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> value that indicates the return value of the **Add Web Reference** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> 值，這個值表示 [新增 Web 參考] 對話方塊的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents a URL.
trans-unit.target: 表示 URL 的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the proxy class associated with the specified universal resource locator (URL).
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定「統一資源定位器」(URL) 關聯的 Proxy 類別類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about the current component.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關目前元件的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns property context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associated with the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，與 Proxy 類別關聯。

trans-unit.source: Returns the universal resource locator (URL) for the Web resource associated with the specified proxy class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定 Proxy 類別關聯之 Web 資源的「統一資源定位器」(URL，Universal Resource Locator)。

trans-unit.source: The URL for the Web resource associated with the proxy class.
trans-unit.target: 與 Proxy 類別關聯之 Web 資源的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由加入至工作流程專案中之 XSD 結構描述產生的型別。

trans-unit.source: The types that are generated for the XSD schema that is added to the workflow project.
trans-unit.target: 由加入至工作流程專案中之 XSD 結構描述產生的型別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 要巡覽的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the specified property in the property browser of the workflow designer host.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至工作流程設計工具主應用程式之屬性瀏覽器中的指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property was navigated to successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功巡覽至屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all designer actions in the task list associated with the workflow designer host.
trans-unit.target: 刪除與工作流程設計工具主應用程式關聯之工作清單中的所有設計工具動作。

trans-unit.source: Displays the tools options associated with the workflow designer host.
trans-unit.target: 顯示與工作流程設計工具主應用程式關聯的工具選項。
